Package json

Class JSONFactory

java.lang.Object
json.JSONFactory
public abstract class JSONFactory extends Object
Factory for creating JSON Values.

Since some values are immutable, common shared instances are used when possible.
Author:
mdixon

    static JSONArray
    createArray()

    Creates a mutable JSON array value with a specific initial size.
    static JSONArray
    createArray​(JSONArray original)
    Creates a mutable JSON array value, as a copy of an existing array.

    A deep copy of the given array contents is performed (for mutable elements).

    • createObject

      public static final JSONObject createObject​(JSONObject original)
      Creates a mutable JSON object value, as a copy of an existing object.

      A deep copy of the given object contents is performed (for mutable elements).

      Parameters:
      original - the original object from which to copy the new object contents.
      Returns:
      the created JSONObject value.

      public static final JSONArray createArray​(int initialSize)
      Creates a mutable JSON array value with a specific initial size.
      Parameters:
      initialSize - the initial size of the array
      Returns:
      the created JSONArray value.

    • createArray

      public static final JSONArray createArray​(JSONArray original)
      Creates a mutable JSON array value, as a copy of an existing array.

      A deep copy of the given array contents is performed (for mutable elements).

      Parameters:
      original - the original array from which to copy the new array contents.
      Returns:
      the created JSONArray value.
